name: Entity: The Clumsy Sorcerer
description:
I started learning Unity and pixel art a few weeks ago and this is the first game I have ever made. 

Its a survival game where you play as Entity, "The clumsy sorcerer", who is lost in the haunted forest. Help him fight the ghosts trying to attack him but tread carefully as this forest is know to be the Demon King's territory!

I would love to get feedback on this game!
